TopicTitle: You have 10,000 of whatever is in your profile picture. What do you do?

Articles.Content: 10,000 Mun landers? Time to colonize the mun! FOREVER! BWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
I guess I can give people my logo now.
I now have 10,000 huge space stations- time to become a self-sustaining society!
I don’t have enough disposable income to buy a rocket larger than anything made by Estes. I do have a crack team of mission controls, which is nice.
I think having 10,000 fully-armed, flight-ready and fully-crewed F-14 Tomcats would sufficiently put me on multiple National Security watchlists and make me the world's largest Air force.

10k chonker planes? Oh no

 

 

hmmmmmm

since try are Sabre powered, I colonize all atmospheric bodies

Edited January 26, 2021 by JcoolTheShipbuilder

10,000 semi-maniacal six year olds with advanced weaponry?

I guess I’d have the worlds least organized space army force

I have ten thousand white with black backgrounds kerbals.

Edited January 27, 2021 by NutellaSandwich
spelling
I gess i have 10000 kerbins and kerbals
10,000 Dragons!

10000 thumbs up.

Break the like limit on the forum by a factor of 400.

10,000 nichelings

I would make them build a space fleet powered by kraken drives and dominate all planets.

An army of confused kerbals (hey, what planet is this?) drifiting around a barren wasteland, in search of cupcakes.

Any that they find are mine.
The Ultramarines knocking on my door very displeased at the level of disespect the Blood Angels have for the Codex Astartes.
Yay! I have 10000 dogs! I then die in poverty after having to spend millions of dollars on dog food
Give people night mares.

Oh, if only I had a Liebherr mobile crane as my profile picture!! Well, currently I would have 10,000 Wernher von Kermans, but that might involve cloning and/or slavery, and I am not interested in either of those. So, I guess would need to find a place to dispose of the cloning equipment, maybe I would take one of the cloning units apart for the lights, wires, and pumps in it or something.

Edited May 1, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman

On 1/26/2021 at 12:58 PM, Spaceman.Spiff said:

10,000 semi-maniacal six year olds with advanced weaponry?

I guess I’d have the worlds least organized space army force

Yes but even in the chaotic mess all of you guys could probably take control of Susie Derkins house and capture Mrs wormwood. And you could also get revenge on Roslyn, your parents, and Moe.

And maybe my box army and your work together fight.

Edited May 1, 2021 by Stormpilot

Oh, if only I had a Liebherr mobile crane as my profile picture!! Well, currently I would have 10,000 Wernher von Kermans, but that might involve cloning and/or slavery, and I am not interested in either of those. So, I guess would need to find a place to dispose of the cloning equipment, maybe I would take one of the cloning units apart for the lights, wires, and pumps in it or something.

Just make the Wernhers make cranes for you

cool i now have 10000 sentient space rocks. i can have them build anything i want

but if you count the two slivers in the background, i either have 10000 terraforming aliens, or 10000 pieces of corn
Cool, 10,000 jools and 10,000 laythes!
Ten-thousand classrooms!
bwahaha
Ten thousand ISVs! Colonization of the cosmic neighbourhood!!
10,000 planets in the habitble zone, just impossbly unstable
